abstract: Workers at the Grenoble plant released the managers after President Nicolas Sarkozy said he would meet with union members who are disputing severance packages.
snippet: Workers at the Grenoble plant released the managers after President Nicolas Sarkozy said he would meet with union members who are disputing severance packages.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Workers at a Caterpillar plant in the French Alps let their bosses go Wednesday after holding them overnight in a dispute over their severance packages.

headline.main: Standoff Ends at Caterpillar Plant in France
headline.print_headline: Standoff Ends at Caterpillar Plant in France
